name: Number of sessions for the past 28 days
description:
Analysis of the traffic created over the past month can be compared to the previous reports to reflect trends and improve the website. A result of 0 sessions created over the past month indicates a technical issue or a faulty measurement of the data.
Tip: you can duplicate this test and replace the metric name (in both Query logic and Test logic) to check its value in the last month.

blocks.description: If there are no sessions found in last 28 days, the test fails.
blocks.failHowtofix: Check, if the GA code is triggered on the website.
